resources.string: Cerrid Solutions derives its name from the Irish goddess Cerrid, who imparted knowledge, wisdom and intelligence to humans. Cerrid is an end to end solutions provider in Analytics, Financial Research and Application Development. We partner with the business houses to enable them to accomplish more by concentrating on core activities. Cerridâ€™s in depth knowledge of Banking, Insurance, Real Estate, Capital and Equity Market is key to the success of the customers. Our solutions range from basic to advanced analytics needs of our clients. We also have product portfolio which has been evolving with time and market movements. Cerrid always strives to detect common problems and covert it into product solutions before the client sees it. This helps our customers to be ahead in the competitive marketplace. We at Cerrid always strive for the best and cost effective technology utilization. We are experts in cloud technologies, Big data storage and analytics including open source technologies.
Our vision is to be a leader in enabling our clients to make efficient data driven decisions and concentrate on their core businesses by carrying the best talent together k

Our leadership is committed to providing innovative and holistic solutions to our clients across the Globe. Our management team comprises of professionals with an average of 10 yrs of Management and Delivery experience
Our vision is to be a leader in enabling our clients to make efficient data driven decisions and concentrate on their core businesses by carrying the best talent together
